SIMPLE ABROAD CALLS
FREE WONEP TO WONEP
NO HIDDEN CHARGES OR FEES
Wonep converts international calls to local calls without WiFi or data
If the person youâ€™re calling also has Wonep the call will be entirely free
We have a very small charge for non-Wonep calls to mobiles or landlines
Enter your email address and we will send\nan otp to help you reset your password.

To reset your password please enter the 4-digit code that was sent to your
Welcome to Vibex\nWallet
Vibex keeps your Bitcoin safe while making it easy to use\n\nWe\'re excited to have you on board.
Share Vibex and get free BitCoin

Did you know you can invite your friends to Vibex and get free Bitcoin ? 

Get NGN100.00 worth of bitcoin for each friend who signs up and buys oe sells at least NGN 5,000.00 Bitcoin using your special code.

P.S Your frinds will get NGN 100.00 worth of Bitcoin too!
Vibex uses your mobile\nnumber to protect your\naccount.
Enter the confirmation code\nsent via SMS to
Thanks for verifying your\nmobile number
Your information has been \nverified.
Enter your personal details as\ndisplayed on your official\nidentity document.
Two-factor authentication keeps\nyour account more secure by\nrequiring both your password and\your phone to login.
Keep your recovery code in a safe\nplace.
Without it there will be on way to\nregain access to your account it you\nlose your phone
Set your Vibex accont in your\nauthentication app, using your\nrecovery code from previous step.
Enter the 6 digit code from\nyour authenticator app below
Two-factor authentication\nhas been successfully\nenabled
Add your bank detail to withdraw money\nfrom Vibex
How would you like to add money to your\nVibex Wallet.
Using GT Collections, make a payment with the following detail to the Vibex merchant. This option is only available for GT Bank customers via GT bank app.
Dont forget to make that deposit!\nwhen we recive your deposit it\nwill be added to your Vibex wallet
Create alerts to let you know when the\nBitcoin price changes
To protect your security you can only withdraw money into an account in your name.\n\nPlease use the full name shown on your bank statements otherwise the withdrawal may be cancelled.
Vibex follows the same global compliance standards as traditional financial institutions to ensure the platform is secure for all.
We ask for your mobile number plus some basic information about who you are to confirm your identity
We respect your privacy, taking every precaution to secure your personal data while making it easier to use Bitcoin

Please upload a color scan detailed color photo of the front and back of your national identity card, or the front of your passport driver,s license or permanent voter,s card\n\nit should clearly show your details(names, date of birth and photo)
Are you sure document is entirely within the frame and easy to read?

For an introduction to two-factor authentication, see What is two-factor authentication.\n\n Your Bitcoin is valuable, Protecting it with two-factor authentication is strongly recommended. In this article we will show you how to set up two-factor authentication for your Vibex wallet.

to enter your code

(exchange excluded), you will both recive
NGN 100.00 worth of Bitcoin.

Thank you for providing the required documentation. We are now busy reviewing your information. Due to high volume of new customers, this can take up to five business days.
